overview: Cumshots and facials, and nothing else! Jonni Darkko has painstakingly collected his best popshots & only the cream (get it?) of his Evil Angel releases & and edited them all into one long outrageous spermathon! Face after pretty face gets plastered with gooey man-spew, for one super extended climax involving 175 semen-happy sluts. All you fans of the money shot will definitely want to load up on this fun-drenched compilation!
title: Load Warriors
